member.name: T:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.CodeFixVerifier
member.summary: Superclass of all Unit tests made for diagnostics with codefixes. Contains methods used to verify correctness of codefixes

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.CodeFixVerifier.ApplyFix(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Document,Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CodeActions.CodeAction)
member.summary: Apply the inputted CodeAction to the inputted document. Meant to be used to apply codefixes.
member.param: The Document to apply the fix on
A CodeAction that will be applied to the Document.
member.returns: A Document with the changes from the CodeAction

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.CodeFixVerifier.GetNewDiagnostics(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostic},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostic})
member.summary: Compare two collections of Diagnostics, and return a list of any New diagnostics that appear only in the second collection. Note: Considers Diagnostics to be the same if they have the same Ids. In the case of multiple diagnostics With the same Id In a row, this method may not necessarily return the new one.
member.param: The Diagnostics that existed in the code before the CodeFix was applied
The Diagnostics that exist in the code after the CodeFix was applied
member.returns: A list of Diagnostics that only surfaced in the code after the CodeFix was applied

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.CodeFixVerifier.GetCompilerDiagnostics(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Document)
member.summary: Get the existing compiler diagnostics on the inputted document.
member.param: The Document to run the compiler diagnostic analyzers on
member.returns: The compiler diagnostics that were found in the code

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.CodeFixVerifier.GetStringFromDocument(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Document)
member.summary: Given a Document, turn it into a string based on the syntax root
member.param: The Document to be converted to a string
member.returns: A string containing the syntax of the Document after formatting

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.CodeFixVerifier.GetCSharpCodeFixProvider
member.summary: Returns the codefix being tested (C#) - to be implemented in non-abstract class
member.returns: The CodeFixProvider to be used for CSharp code

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.CodeFixVerifier.GetBasicCodeFixProvider
member.summary: Returns the codefix being tested (VB) - to be implemented in non-abstract class
member.returns: The CodeFixProvider to be used for VisualBasic code

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.CodeFixVerifier.VerifyCSharpFix(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called to test a C# codefix when applied on the inputted string as a source
member.param: A class in the form of a string before the CodeFix was applied to it
A class in the form of a string after the CodeFix was applied to it
Index determining which codefix to apply if there are multiple
A bool controlling whether Or Not the test will fail if the CodeFix introduces other warnings after being applied

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.CodeFixVerifier.VerifyBasicFix(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called to test a VB codefix when applied on the inputted string as a source
member.param: A class in the form of a string before the CodeFix was applied to it
A class in the form of a string after the CodeFix was applied to it
Index determining which codefix to apply if there are multiple
A bool controlling whether Or Not the test will fail if the CodeFix introduces other warnings after being applied

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.CodeFixVerifier.VerifyFix(System.String,Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.DiagnosticAnalyzer,Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CodeFixes.CodeFixProvider,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean)
member.summary: General verifier for codefixes. Creates a Document from the source string, then gets diagnostics on it And applies the relevant codefixes. Then gets the string after the codefix Is applied And compares it with the expected result. Note: If any codefix causes New diagnostics To show up, the test fails unless allowNewCompilerDiagnostics Is Set To True.
member.param: The language the source code Is in
The analyzer to be applied to the source code
The codefix to be applied to the code wherever the relevant Diagnostic Is found
A class in the form of a string before the CodeFix was applied to it
A class in the form of a string after the CodeFix was applied to it
Index determining which codefix to apply if there are multiple
A bool controlling whether Or Not the test will fail if the CodeFix introduces other warnings after being applied

member.name: T:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticResultLocation
member.summary: Location where the diagnostic appears, as determined by path, line number, And column number.

member.name: T:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticResult
member.summary: Struct that stores information about a Diagnostic appearing in a source

member.name: T:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticVerifier
member.summary: Superclass of all Unit Tests for DiagnosticAnalyzers.

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticVerifier.GetSortedDiagnostics(System.String[],System.String,Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.DiagnosticAnalyzer)
member.summary: Given classes in the form of strings, their language, And an IDiagnosticAnlayzer to apply to it, return the diagnostics found in the string after converting it to a document.
member.param: Classes in the form of strings
The language the source classes are in
The analyzer to be run on the sources
member.returns: An IEnumerable of Diagnostics that surfaced in the source code, sorted by Location

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticVerifier.GetSortedDiagnosticsFromDocuments(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.DiagnosticAnalyzer,Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Document[])
member.summary: Given an analyzer And a document to apply it to, run the analyzer And gather an array of diagnostics found in it. The returned diagnostics are then ordered by location in the source document.
member.param: The analyzer to run on the documents
The Documents that the analyzer will be run on
member.returns: An IEnumerable of Diagnostics that surfaced in the source code, sorted by Location

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticVerifier.SortDiagnostics(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostic})
member.summary: Sort diagnostics by location in source document
member.param: The list of Diagnostics to be sorted
member.returns: An IEnumerable containing the Diagnostics in order of Location

member.param: Classes in the form of strings
The language the source code is in
member.returns: An array of Documents produced from the source strings

The language the source code Is in

member.summary: Create a project using the inputted strings as sources.

The language the source code is in
member.returns: A Project created out of the Douments created from the source strings

DiagnosticResults that should appear after the analyzer Is run on the sources

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticVerifier.VerifyDiagnostics(System.String[],System.String,Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.DiagnosticAnalyzer,DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticResult[])
member.summary: General method that gets a collection of actual diagnostics found in the source after the analyzer Is run, then verifies each of them.
member.param: An array of strings to create source documents from to run the analyzers on
The language of the classes represented by the source strings
The analyzer to be run on the source code
DiagnosticResults that should appear after the analyzer Is run on the sources

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticVerifier.VerifyDiagnosticResults(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostic},Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.DiagnosticAnalyzer,DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticResult[])
member.summary: Checks each of the actual Diagnostics found And compares them with the corresponding DiagnosticResult in the array of expected results. Diagnostics are considered equal only if the DiagnosticResultLocation, Id, Severity, And Message of the DiagnosticResult match the actual diagnostic.
member.param: The Diagnostics found by the compiler after running the analyzer on the source code
The analyzer that was being run on the sources
Diagnostic Results that should have appeared in the code

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticVerifier.VerifyDiagnosticLocation(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.DiagnosticAnalyzer,Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostic,Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Location,DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticResultLocation)
member.summary: Helper method to VerifyDiagnosticResult that checks the location of a diagnostic And compares it with the location in the expected DiagnosticResult.
member.param: The analyzer that was being run on the sources
The diagnostic that was found in the code
The Location of the Diagnostic found in the code
The DiagnosticResultLocation that should have been found

member.name: M:DelSole_VSIX_Analysis.Test.TestHelper.DiagnosticVerifier.FormatDiagnostics(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.DiagnosticAnalyzer,Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostic[])
member.summary: Helper method to format a Diagnostic into an easily readable string
member.param: The analyzer that this verifier tests
The Diagnostics to be formatted
member.returns: The Diagnostics formatted as a string
